segments.text: I'm really enjoying watching these two kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're such little rascals, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on that rickety stool, determined to get to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there with him, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the jar is full, so they're in for a real treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite charming, this covert operation they've set up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the woman is completely oblivious just adds to the humor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on her plate, missing all the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, to be a child with such simple, delicious goals!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get away with a good haul.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little adventure is truly making me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
